description:
Thomas is a model for those who like their men beefy. He's been working out for about 15 years and he's really put on some mass.
Thomas is a little different from most of my other guys in the fact that he has been in front of the camera before. He told me that he did a Playgirl spread that was published sometime late last year. He's real reserved through the whole video, but he did tell me afterward that he was a lot more comfortable doing the shoot for me than he was when he did the thing for Playgirl. I guess those "professional" guys got nothing on me, right? <grin>
title: Thomas
